divs: sighting detailsmy first child was born earlier in the day and i needed to take my mother in-law home, since i was staying at the hospital overnight. i let her in my house, grabbed my dog, and tied on his leash. i took him out to the front yard and started looking into the sky, thanking the lord for the birth of my child. for some reason my eyes caught a glimpse of what appeared to be a transparent object in the sky. however, when i focused in on the moving object\s i notices three orange lights or orbs in a triangular formation. i was unable to tell whether they were separate or one larger object. at first i thought it was the clouds moving, but when i saw the lights (orange objects) i realized it was not a normal aircraft nor was it a helicopter or meteor shower. it was too smooth and fluent of a motion and direction in flight for that. i was confused and stunned at the same time. i went to pull out my phone to take a picture and when i had it ready i lost the objects from pulling my eyes away. after the incident i went inside and told myself that i was not crazy. i waited until i calmed down and drove back out to the hospital.
trends: There has been one other sighting in North Chicago
There were no other sightings in North Chicago on or around January 7th 2013
Summary: Transparent object/s in vicinity of Great Lakes Naval Training station.
